content:
Cancer-Leo Compatibility 
Cancer and Leo individuals possess different attitudes which tends to hurt their pride. Their compatibility works well as a Leo wants to be a leader and a Cancerian is a faithful follower. This love match may result in a successful marriage. A Leo feels contended when a Cancerian showers lot of praises. The hitch in the compatibility comes due their individual temperament. However, the relationship may develop well as they like to be in each other's company. 

Cancer Man and Leo Woman 
This love-match has a great chance of compatibility if the Leo woman and the Cancer man try to compromise with each other. Cancer men are slushy and lofty whereas Leo woman wants love and adoration. If he is confident enough to give her the adoration and compliments she requires, this match can work out. A Leo man and a Cancer woman both have to be very sensitive, though, about the other's sore spots. Overall Ganesha says that this match can work out to be a perfect match provided it is watered by some effort. 
 
Cancer Woman and Leo Man 
Leo men are liberal to share their things. A Leo man loves to spend his time with his partner. The compatibility rates high for this love-match. A Cancer woman craves for faith and respect which a Leo man is ready to concede. A Leo man is always on his heels to give support to her when she is facing a tough time. This love-match shows good compatibility as they respect each other's emotions. Loyalty and commitment are the embodiments of this successful relationship.
